short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your shortcut to personalized League of Legends champion guides. Simplify your gaming journey!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Champion Navigator is your ultimate companion for seamless League of Legends champion exploration. Tailor your experience, access favorite champions, and swiftly navigate their guides, all in one extension.

Features:
Personalized Champion Favorites: Easily access and manage your preferred champions.
Custom Shortcut Configurations: Create personalized shortcuts to your favorite champion guides.
Effortless Navigation: Quickly find and explore champion guides without hassle.
Role-Based Tier Lists: Instantly access tier lists based on roles for strategic insights.
Empower your League of Legends journey with Champion Navigator, simplifying your champion exploration and enhancing your gaming experience.
